text: Can check for amaze tag with Citi rewards  what transactions to use for 10x points?

so long MCC not excluded. Exclusions e.g. travel  transports  utility  and other common exclusions
Hi  what are your recommendations for best miles & cashback credit cards for fresh grads?
Anyone share cardup experience for air miles?
depends how much u spend a month and what categories of spending

UOB EVOL  6.67% cashback  which can pair with UOB One Account. Several other miles cards with UOB that pool.DBS Live Fresh  5% cashback. Both not limited to specific MCCs  min spend $600 vs $800 for some cards.Miles with HSBC Revo. No annual fee. Cover common categories like groceries and dining.

Both miles or cashback I am fine. Best is miles card
Can consider UOB Lady card  choose travel category
Depends on which websites you book hotel n air ticket n also which airlines..

Sorry gurus I just noticed my previous question miss out words. I shall type again. So sorry.🙏I have done my best to search...Paying by HSBC account using giro for insurance is the only ways to earn rebate? Any other credit card ways?Monthly recurring and yearly payment.

If your insurance company accepts Amex then can consider UOB Absolute Amex

Yes. Somebody knows. They mentioned it in the chat history. Search using “Citi Atome reward” shall be able to find it.

Headed overseas for travel next week. Does anyone know if i use uob solitaire on overseas dining - essentially i'll still enjoy the MCC category spend on dining and hence the points award but at SGD (or better exchange rates)?

I remember somebody asked this question before. You can use keyword “Uob dining oversea” to search chat history related to this query and see what others reply.Good luck to you and enjoy your rewards accumulation journey.

Hi  could anyone advise whether 5 x fund transfers is counted as 5 transactions made under HSBC EGA account to get the bonus cashback of 1%? 😁
You can use Heymax to check. It is a very useful free tool to let u know which credit cards can earn best rewards. You can search best rewards using merchant name or mcc code.https://heymax.ai/search
Oh fund transfers to a non-hsbc account
Wah I finally received the physical iChange card inside an envelope sealed with a transparent bag…send by hand via courier who had leave it at my doorstep. 😁Sender address was from Nium Sdn Bhd 🤔
Hmm is iChange and Instarem from the same company? 😬
No. iChange pays Nium for card issuance.
is it possible to setup auto payment of uob credit cards with uob one balance? Ideally within the app

first 3 no of your a/c?
You are lucky. Mine almost three months. Never receive any card even virtual card
From mid Nov 2023 till now
Because the first 3 number number is 145. But I check online all saying it's 146.. so I not sure which is the correct one
🤔 not sure whether is it because I use the chat function within the app to ask on the status 😬
Then it seems to be correct
So it's 145 (my first 3 account number) or 146?
Chat within app  u mean whatsapp is it? All the time i whatsapp them and asking abt my status. Those common execuses  check with technical team  IT team  compliance team.
Yes  the chat will open WhatsApp. Oh ic..then it is weird for such long delay
